Text:
Please check the screens and sample before downloading..

If you like the download/encode/upload (not the movie) and my work please click on the "+1" next to quality and do comment on it ..

Please seed atleast 1:1 so other people could download as well..

Thank you

I want to WARN about two things in this release.

1) The movie switches between 2.35:1 and 1.85:1 aspect ratio automatically (i didn't have anything to do with it ..It was the Blu-Ray)

2) It does come with a bag of noise included and i am sorry to say but that's how the film was shot and released.

If you got a problem with these two please leave it (check the sample first if you have any doubt) and if you did download it before reading this comment  ...Well ...I am sorry .
Peace
